Package ro.tuc.pt.BusinessLogic

Class OrderBLL

java.lang.Object
ro.tuc.pt.BusinessLogic.OrderBLL
public class OrderBLL extends Object
The class that uses the OrderValidator class and adds the valid elements in the Order tabel. It is also used to generate the bill for every order.

    • makeOrders

      public boolean makeOrders(Order order)
      Method that calls the insert method and generates the bill for the last added order.
      Parameters:
      order - the instance that need to be inserted in the Order table.
      Returns:
      true if inserted succesfully, false otherwise.

    • getOrders

      public List<Order> getOrders()
      Method that extracts all the data from tabel Order.
      Returns:
      data from tabel Order.

    • insert

      public boolean insert(Order order)
      Method that inserts the new order in the tabel if it is validated by the order validator and displays an error message otherwise, with the help of the OrderDao class. It also decrements the product's stock when an order is made.
      Parameters:
      order - represents the Order instance that needs to be inserted in the table.
      Returns:
      true if the order was inserted succsesfully, false otherwise.

    • update

      public boolean update(Order order)
      Method that uses the OrderDAO class to update an order's values in the Order table.
      Parameters:
      order - the instance containing the values that need to be updated.
      Returns:
      true if the Data was updated succesfully, false otherwise.

    • delete

      public boolean delete(String id)
      Method that uses the OrderDAO class to delete a row form the table Order in the database. It also increments the stock of a product when an order containing that product id deleted.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the instance that needs to be deleted from the table.
      Returns:
      true if deleted successfully, false otherwise.

    • getTotalPrice

      public double getTotalPrice(Order order)
      Method that gets the total price of an order.
      Parameters:
      order - is the order for which we have to calculate the price.
      Returns:
      true if calculated successfully, false otherwise.

    • generateBill

      public void generateBill(int id, Order order)
      Method that generates the bill for an order and prints the data into a text file.
      Parameters:
      id - is the id of the last placed order.
      order - the order we need to generate the bill for.
